title: Finding a Clear Path on the Road of Modernity
description:
I had the chance to sit down with 2 excellent gentlemen,@Paul VanderKlay and Ryan Bennett. We discussed the ways in which we communicate in this modern age, and why we must find ways to do so in a meaningful manner.

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Finding-a-Clear-Path-on-the-Road-of-Modernity-ek4c3r

My original chat with Ryan on IDW Protocol: https://youtu.be/z3TCy8X_0bw

Check out Paul's YouTube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg

Follow Paul and Ryan on twitter: @PaulVanderKlay and @Ry_Nomad

Follow me on Twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
email me at: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
